1.m_mDefeatPrompt: "Using Vassal skills at the right moment might just turn the tide of battle."

2.m_mDefeatPrompt: "Eliminate the Shield Spirit to clear the stage."

4.m_mDefeatPrompt: "Interrupt enemies attempting to charge. Eliminate those charging first."

5.m_mDefeatPrompt: "Survive until the countdown ends, even if enemies remain. Survival is victory."

6.m_mDefeatPrompt: "Losing Vassals will slow down the Bloodsoul Recovery."

7.m_mDefeatPrompt: "Assassins and Marksmen excel at targeting backline enemies."

8.m_mDefeatPrompt: "Utilize AoE skills effectively to deal DMG to more enemies."

9.m_mDefeatPrompt: "DMG dealt by Marksmen increases with distance—the farther, the stronger."

10.m_mDefeatPrompt: "Some enemies can bypass Defenders to assault your ranged Vassals."

11.m_mDefeatPrompt: "Destroying objects in the environment may swing the battle in your favor."

12.m_mDefeatPrompt: "Deploy Vassals skilled in frontline combat to enhance durability for the team."

13.m_mDefeatPrompt: "Set up your Initial Hand wisely to gain an advantage in battle."

14.m_mDefeatPrompt: "Don’t lose heart, Lord. Try a different lineup and keep challenging."
